ai-tha-ap87:1.1_0: “The Himalayas are falling from the Himalayas,
ai-tha-ap87:1.2_0: if I were to get what was allowable;
ai-tha-ap87:1.4_0: I stay in a mountain cleft.
ai-tha-ap87:3.2_0: such a one, the great hermit,
ai-tha-ap87:3.4_0: I am the one who raises the head,
ai-tha-ap87:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap87:4.4_0: you’ll find the fruit of the good.”
ai-tha-ap87:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Simila.
